beginner_foundation.name: Beginner Foundation Session
beginner_foundation.description: Basic water comfort and floating skills for new swimmers
beginner_foundation.warm_up: 5 minutes water walking and gentle movement
beginner_foundation.notes: Focus on comfort and confidence building. Stop if feeling anxious.

kick_focus.name: Kick Development Session
kick_focus.description: Concentrated breaststroke kick technique and power building
kick_focus.warm_up: 10 minutes easy swimming or water walking
kick_focus.notes: Rest 30 seconds between kick sets. Focus on technique over speed.

breathing_coordination.name: Breathing & Timing Session
breathing_coordination.description: Develop breathing patterns and stroke timing
breathing_coordination.notes: Practice slowly. Focus on rhythm rather than distance.

stroke_development.name: Full Stroke Development
stroke_development.description: Integrate arms, legs, and breathing into complete stroke
stroke_development.warm_up: 15 minutes easy kick and arm drills
stroke_development.notes: Work on coordination. Quality over quantity.

endurance_building.name: Distance & Endurance Session
endurance_building.description: Build swimming stamina while maintaining technique
endurance_building.warm_up: 20 minutes mixed kick and arm drills
endurance_building.notes: Pace yourself. Rest when technique begins to break down.

technique_refinement.name: Technique Polish Session
technique_refinement.notes: Concentrate on precision. Video analysis recommended.

instructor_assessment.name: Pre-Lesson Assessment Session
instructor_assessment.description: Practice specific skills before instructor evaluation
instructor_assessment.notes: Skills will be assigned by instructor. Focus on consistency.

safety_guidelines: Never practice alone - always have supervision available
Stop practice if experiencing fatigue that affects technique
Ensure emergency equipment and contacts are accessible
Practice within your current skill level
When in doubt, seek qualified instruction
